title: JUST IN: STF deployed with batons at site of protest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police Special Task Force has been deployed with batons at the site of the ongoing protest near the President’s residence in Mirihana a short while ago.
The barrier which was enacted by the Police was also broken down by the protestors.
News 1st previously reported that the internet connectivity of the area was broken down while internet connectivity in several areas was also reported down.
JUST IN: Tear gas and water cannons being fired at protestors
Massive protests erupt as people converge near President’s House in Sri Lanka
